Class PlayerRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.tron_master.tron.view.game_view.PlayerRenderer
public class PlayerRenderer extends Object
View class responsible for rendering Player objects.

    • drawPlayer

      public void drawPlayer(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, ColorValue colorValue, int x, int y, int width, int height, List<Line> path)
      Draw player and their trail.
      Parameters:
      gc - JavaFX graphics context
      colorValue - player color
      x - player x coordinate
      y - player y coordinate
      width - player width
      height - player height
      path - trail segments to draw
